title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
content: Up for auction is a collection of the four Diario El Salvador Newspapers relating to their adoption and advancement of Bitcoin within their country.The papers are all in pristine condition and are in protective sleeves. Auction Terms:Auction is for 1 lot of all 4 papersStarting Bid:  0.03 BTCBid Increments:  0.001 BTC please keep to 3 decimal placesAuction Ends:  Wednesday, 15 March 2023 @ 3pm ESTSniping:  A bid in the final 10 minutes adds 10 minutes to the end of the auction time, this continues until no bid has been made for 10 minutesExcluded from Bidding:   I may exclude/disqualify bidders, or require a deposit, for any bidders at my sole discretion.  Shipping:  At cost and in addition to the winning bid.  Ships from USA.  Buyer responsible for any local customs/duties. Can also be sent to minerjones for consolidated reshipping.Payment due within 24 hours of auction closing and in BTC to address: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4es
